data.introduction: Experienced Web developer with sound programming and scripting skills. Eager to learn new technologies and adapt quickly to new frameworks. My aim is to apply 'Test driven' approach to develop fast, scalable, secure and responsive websites following agile methodologies.

projects.projectDescription: Developed a Digital Telemetry transmitter prototype for IRS satellites
projectResponsibilites: Applied the knowledge of communication principles in real time transmission of telemetry data.
Implemented the functionality of Digital Direct Synthesis with a 16-bit NCO.
Designed a DDS based telemetry system.
Simulated a Look-Up table based DDS and verified the output by simulating a pseudo code of the origical on MATLAB.
Synthesized the transmitter functionality onto a PROASIC board, and observed the Phase Modulated output, further updating the currently running frequency values using a MATLAB GUI.
